testimonials.title: Customer Reviews
testimonials.review1: The food tastes just like home! I've been ordering their tiffin for 3 months now and never been disappointed. Great quality and always on time.
testimonials.review2: As a working professional, HomieBites has been a lifesaver. The food is healthy, tasty and reminds me of my mother's cooking. Highly recommended!
testimonials.review3: I love their khichdi tiffin! Perfect balance of spices and always delivered hot. The monthly subscription offer is a great deal too.

about.title: About HomieBites
about.description1: We serve fresh, homemade vegetarian meals prepared with care. Based at
about.description2: we deliver daily tiffins throughout the neighborhood.
about.description3: At HomieBites, we believe good food should taste like home. Our meals are prepared in a clean, hygienic kitchen, using quality ingredients and traditional recipes. We focus on balanced nutrition with less oil and the perfect amount of spices to suit every palate.
about.description5: our mission is to provide busy professionals and families with convenient access to healthy, home-style meals at affordable prices.

feature1.title: 100% Pure Vegetarian
feature1.description: Completely vegetarian meals made with fresh, natural ingredients

feature3.description: Cooked with minimal oil for a healthier lifestyle

about.whyChooseSubtitle: Experience the difference with our commitment to quality and freshness
about.whyChooseIntro: At HomieBites, we understand that your daily meals should be more than just food‚Äîthey should be a source of comfort, nutrition, and joy. Our commitment goes beyond cooking; we create experiences that bring the warmth of home to your table every single day.
about.benefit1: Hygienic kitchen with strict quality control
about.benefit3: Flexible ordering - daily or monthly subscription
about.benefit4: Traditional recipes passed down through generations

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Find answers to common questions about our service.
faq.q1: How do I place an order?
faq.a1: You can place an order through our website by adding items to your cart and proceeding to checkout, or contact us directly via WhatsApp.
faq.a2: We deliver daily. Last order time is 7:30 PM, and delivery is completed by 8:30 PM.
faq.q3: What areas do you deliver to?
faq.a3: We currently deliver to Panchsheel Greens, A1-A5 Towers, B1-B3 Towers, and nearby societies.
faq.q4: What payment methods do you accept?
faq.a4: We accept cash on delivery, online payments, and UPI payments.
faq.a5: Yes! We offer Mix & Match options where you can choose your preferred combination of sabji, rotis, and rice.
faq.a6: Yes, we offer monthly subscription plans. Contact us for more details.
faq.q7: What if I need to cancel my order?
faq.a7: Please contact us at least 2 hours before delivery time to cancel your order.
faq.a8: Yes, all our food is 100% vegetarian and prepared with fresh ingredients.

footer.emergencyDelivery: Only for some emergency, we can hand over order at main gate for other societies

login.title: Welcome Back
login.passwordTooShort: Password must be at least 6 characters
login.infoText: Hello. Setting up an account with us is relatively simple, and it makes life a little easier for you if you have a question about an order or a recent delivery.
login.benefit1: Have all your order history (and tracking) in one place.
login.benefit2: Access your account balance to use on future orders.
login.benefit3: Easily make changes to your subscriptions.

account.title: My Account
account.confirmLogout: Are you sure you want to logout?

order.selectItems: Please select at least one item

support.subtitle: We are here to help you with any questions or concerns.

ordering.title: How to Order
ordering.description: Everything you need to know about placing orders
ordering.answer1: You can place an order via WhatsApp (+91-9958983578), through our website menu page, or by calling us. Orders should be placed at least 1 hour before delivery time (7:30 PM).
ordering.answer2: We accept Cash on Delivery (COD), UPI payments, and online transfers. Payment can be made at the time of delivery or in advance.
ordering.item3: Can I modify or cancel my order?
ordering.answer3: Yes, you can modify or cancel your order by contacting us via WhatsApp or phone at least 30 minutes before the delivery time.
ordering.answer4: Once your order is confirmed, you will receive a confirmation message. You can track your order status through your account or contact us directly.

delivery.title: Delivery Information
delivery.answer1: We deliver to all towers in Panchsheel Greens (A1-A5, B1-B3) and nearby areas within a 2km radius. For locations beyond this, please contact us to check availability.
delivery.answer2: We deliver daily between 7:30 PM to 8:30 PM. Last orders are accepted until 7:00 PM. We deliver 7 days a week, including weekends.
delivery.answer3: Free delivery on orders ‚Çπ100 and above. For orders below ‚Çπ100, a delivery charge of ‚Çπ20 applies. Self-pickup is also available from A1-405, Panchsheel Greens.
delivery.item4: What if I'm not available during delivery?
delivery.answer4: Please inform us in advance if you won't be available. You can arrange for someone else to receive the order or reschedule for another time.

account.title: Account & Profile
account.description: Manage your account, addresses, and orders
account.answer1: Click on the Login/Account icon in the header, then select "Sign Up". Fill in your details (name, email, phone, password) and you're all set!
account.answer2: Once logged in, go to your Account page and click on "Addresses". You can add, edit, or set a default address for faster checkout.
account.answer3: All your past orders are available in your Account page under the "Orders" tab. You can view order details, status, and reorder items.
account.answer4: Please contact us via WhatsApp or phone, and we'll help you reset your password.

menu.title: Menu & Pricing
menu.description: Information about our menu items and pricing
menu.answer1: We offer Full Tiffin (complete meals), Mix & Match Tiffin (customizable), and Khichdi. Check our Menu page for the complete list with current prices.
menu.answer2: Our prices start from ‚Çπ100. Full tiffin meals range from ‚Çπ100-‚Çπ150. Prices are updated regularly and displayed on our Menu page.
menu.answer3: We offer monthly subscription discounts (7% off for 30 days). Check our Special Offers section for current promotions and deals.
menu.answer4: Yes! Our Mix & Match Tiffin option allows you to customize your meal. Contact us via WhatsApp to discuss your preferences.
